title: 你们玩我的世界有没有必装的mod？
author: da_y_c
txt_content: 我1.12.2必装等价交换、无尽贪婪，其他都无所谓

replies.author: Mr_Snake
replies.txt_content:
拔刀剑必装
不然我打怪直接裂开

replies.author: 迷灬离
replies.txt_content:
Mr_Snake 发表于 2020-7-16 13:37
拔刀剑必装
不然我打怪直接裂开
你这技术我服了

replies.author: 零素
replies.txt_content: 连锁挖矿必加

replies.author: 贴贴暖宝宝
replies.txt_content:
强制疾跑

然后，然后莫得啦:D

replies.author: 无谓z
replies.txt_content: 必装连锁挖矿

replies.author: Mr_Snake
replies.txt_content:
迷离fyx 发表于 2020-7-16 13:37
你这技术我服了
所以说我不玩RPG服啊
不然我秒倒

replies.author: louyukai
replies.txt_content: 我一般玩纯净，不装任何mod(整合包除外)，顶多来个小地图

replies.author: kZ_YWing
replies.txt_content: 高清修复就够了

replies.author: Wudji
replies.txt_content:
迷离fyx 发表于 2020-7-16 13:37
你这技术我服了
不如装个shuiying

replies.author: qq564115198
replies.txt_content: 有吧，百度一下吧啊！

replies.author: AzZ丶FaFa
replies.txt_content: 我反正肯定要装小地图，这是真的(○｀ε´○)

replies.author: ZhangCheng11
replies.txt_content: 装等价节奏太快了

replies.author: q869071347
replies.txt_content: 小地图  更多箱子  AE  工业2

replies.author: Minecraft.Wnxi
replies.txt_content: 拔刀剑和暮色森林

replies.author: 诸神之地
replies.txt_content: 应用能源，没ae2不玩。

replies.author: 君忆
replies.txt_content: 显示血量的，显示耐久的，一键整理，小地图

replies.author: 木大攻
replies.txt_content:
说起等价交换、、
我基本属于必不装了
不喜欢这种迷之快餐的mod

replies.author: 孤独2333
replies.txt_content: 有的 。我必装多页箱子和鼠标手势

replies.author: 胖纸wzl
replies.txt_content: 啊，合成表算么
MCBBS有你更精彩~

replies.author: PTSD∝吝啬唐
replies.txt_content: 以及森林蝙蝠

replies.author: luclifer
replies.txt_content: 拔刀剑可还行，别的你可以试试极简血量显示

replies.author: LomOvO
replies.txt_content: 辅助类的基本都拉进去
